name: Robin R
description: I’m a fun loving and caring person who likes to treat people the same way I will like them to treat me. I’m romantic/optimistic, considerate, outgoing person, warm in nature and very creative. I like to say what I feel and what I think…I don’t like to keep my opinion just in my mind…I do like to speak about everything. I’m intellectual, emotional, confident person and I have a sense of humor, I like to laugh and have fun. I like to spend time at the gym, swim/sunbathe, hike, tennis…wine tasting, fine dining, shopping, traveling, spa…
